column3: X X Physical Intervention: Wrap- T/O Room: Student came to FACS and was offered a break to draw. He drew but threw the board and marker
column4: when staff confiscated those he became physically aggressive and targeted para who had the marker and board. Writer wrapped when he began to punch and hit and called support. crawled to TO with PAS staff to calm.

column3: Student was upset with a peer and attempted to grab him and scratched peer. Peer retaliated and punched student in the left eye. Student was escalated; peer was removed
column4: however student targeted another peer. Support was called

column3: Student became upset because he missed the video in Library. He became aggressive toward staff. Support was called and student continued to hit staff and was directed to a calming room.
Student became upset during ELA and engaged in self-harm continuously. Student was escorted out by support staff to a time out room.
X X X X X X X X X X was sitting at his desk and was at the table working on a project. A dinosaur fell off of 's desk and when went to grab something
column4: he accidentally stepped on it. was already heightened due to significant noise in the hallway and became even more upset. The boys were making noise at the table and got up and charged toward them. stood up and walked in front of NE and NE slapped Staff was right there attempting to calm the situation and immediately separated the students. was escorted to T/O room and was taken to the nurse.
